Title: Easy As Pie
Plot: Dexter begins working with Miguel but they quickly have differences in selecting a potential new victim. Meanwhile Rita discovers that Miguel's wife suspects him of an affair. And an old friend of Dexter's asks for help in ending her life.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Jimmy Smits, Jason Manuel Olazabal, Desmond Harrington, David Ramsey, Liza Lapira, Valerie Cruz, Anne Ramsay
